explanation: [0-0] A green Minecraft turtle holds a torch in its right hand, standing on the grass at night. Behind it are thick grass and a tree. Below is the white subtitle "@KamuiAnimation".

[0-3] The turtle starts to twist its body while holding the torch. Then the camera zooms out, a white Minecraft skeleton holding a bow and arrow shoots at the turtle. The green turtle turns orange, falls to the ground and disappears, dropping a sword, a blue egg, an emerald, a torch, and an apple.

[0-3] The turtle starts to twist its body while holding the torch. Then the camera zooms out, a white Minecraft skeleton holding a bow and arrow shoots at the turtle. The green turtle turns orange, falls to the ground and disappears, dropping a sword, a blue egg, an emerald, a torch, and an apple.

[3-7] Then, the scene changes to daytime, the green turtle reappears and runs towards the dropped items on the grass, and the items on the ground disappear. Then the scene changes to a white skeleton in front of a mountain on fire and waving its arms, with the green turtle next to it waving its arms in the same way as the skeleton. The white skeleton falls to the ground, and the green turtle shakes its head with both hands.

[7-9] Subsequently, a bed is placed on a blue background, and the green turtle lies on the bed. Immediately afterwards, the scene changes to the green turtle lying on a red stone by the lava, the surrounding area burning, and the green turtle is burned to death. After that, the scene changes to the green turtle dancing on a stone pillar, with an iron golem in front of it with an angry expression on its head, and a house to the right of the green turtle.
